INFO TECH

Introduction

Age-Star, a multifaceted business solutions company, extends its expertise into the realm of information technology with its dedicated division, Info-Tech Consulting. Specializing in delivering innovative and strategic IT solutions, Age-Star's Info-Tech Consulting division is committed to providing clients with cutting- edge technology services to drive digital transformation and business success.

Vision

Age-Star, a multifaceted business solutions company, extends its expertise into the realm of information technology with its dedicated division, Info-Tech Consulting. Specializing in delivering innovative and strategic IT solutions, Age-Star's Info-Tech Consulting division is committed to providing clients with cutting- edge technology services to drive digital transformation and business success.

Mission

Age-Star's Info-Tech Consulting division is on a mission to deliver client-focused IT consulting services that seamlessly integrate with business objectives. Through strategic planning, innovation, and tailored solutions, we empower clients to navigate the complexities of the digital landscape and achieve sustainable growth.

Satisfied Clients

Our Values

Working

Integrity:

we ensure honest deals with our clients

Professional

we ensure innovation in product and service provision so that our clients go with latest and up to date technology

Effectiveness

we ensure our services are valuable, effective and efﬁcient.

Timely

we ensure we meet deadlines in discharging our assigned duties so that our clients get our service timely without compromising on quality

Info Tech

Competitive Factors

Our core business services spin around technology by deﬁnition we are ICT product and services providing company. Our aim is to be so focused on this speciﬁc I.C.T. area services which we deliver to you, through quality orientated, innovative and superior services.

Specialization

we have very well trained personnel in I.C.T who when put their skills together put Age-Star on a competitive edge.

Quality

we would like to ensure we develop products that meet speciﬁc needs of our clients but also ensure that customers are satisﬁed, we have personnel abroad speciﬁcally to check whether our services meet international standards.

DESCRIPTION OF OUR PRODUCTS AND SERVICES

Age-Star is a major ICT company that offers world-class Information and Communication Technology (ICT) products and services to businesses, people, organizations, and institutions. In Nigeria and elsewhere, we have experts who are imaginative and creative in supplying these traditional ICT goods and services.

Services that we offer:

Software
Development

Software Development We develop software that your organization, company, or institution may require. We have professional staff in software development who can create standalone software or web-based software to manage your day-to-day transactions and activities. We create inventory systems, point-of-sale software, databases, Electronic Learning systems, and student management systems, to name a few.

Training

We provide Training in different software that you need your employees to be trained in. Some of the software that we provide training include Joomla, WordPress, Drupal for Website Design and Development, Software Development, Web Programming, Graphics Packages for example Adobe Photoshop and other programming languages for example PHP, CSSS, HTML

Network
Installation

We install Local Area Networks (LAN) as well as Wide Area Networks (WAN) for different organizations, Institutions, companies or individuals. We provide 24 hour network support services to companies that we have installed our networks to make sure that the network they are using is up and running.

Web
Design

Age-Star is a company that develops world class websites for your company so that you can expose your brand to the world for wide recognition. We develop static as well as dynamic websites that you may be interested in to meet and suite your needs as our client.

Domain Name
Registration

We Register website domains for companies or organizations who wish to have websites and expose their brand to the outside world.

Computer Repair &
Maintenance

We Repair and maintain computers. When your computer has a hardware or software problem we provide repair services, cleaning the computer from viruses and installing necessary software for smooth running of your computer every day.

Hardware, Software Supply and antivirus Installation

We supply different software that your company needs at any time like Anti viruses, Ofﬁce Packages, Windows Operating systems, SAGE Line 50, Statistical Packages and many others your company needs anytime.

Website Hosting and Email Hosting

We Provide website and email hosting services. We conﬁgure our emails so that they can be accessed anywhere around the world with high level security and other features which makes them easier to use.

Consultancy services

We provide ICT related consultancy services to companies’ individuals, Organizations, institutions and many more.

Core Competencies

Working

Strategic IT Planning

Roadmapping IT Strategies Digital Transformation Planning IT Governance and Compliance

Technology Infrastructure

Network Design and Optimization Cloud Solutions and Migration Scalability and Performance Optimization

Business Process Optimization

Workﬂow Analysis and Enhancement Automation and Integration Solutions Change Management and Training

Custom Software Development

Tailored Application Development Mobile App Development Legacy System Modernization

Cybersecurity and Risk Management

Security Assessments and Compliance Threat Intelligence and Mitigation Disaster Recovery Planning

Industries Served

Age-Star's Info-Tech Consulting division serves a diverse range of industries, including but not limited to: Real Estate and Construction | Finance and Banking | Healthcare | Manufacturing | Retail

Business Type

Development, Supplier ,Agency, Consultancy

Industry Focus

Government, NGOs, Private Companies, Associations, Individuals, etc
